description: This aspect model was created in the Catena-X use case quality. The purpose of this aspect model is to transfer general information of a list/fleet of vehicles - primarily how the vehicles are equipped, when they were built and which engines are installed.

urn_samm_io.catenax.fleet.vehicles_2.0.0.description: This Characteristic describes a property that is truly unque either inside the Company that is providing the data or even in Catena-X dataspace. Only one property in a semantic entity should be a uniqueID. Unique ids can be used to link a data set with other semantic models.

urn_samm_org.eclipse.esmf.samm_character.description: Describes a Property which contains plain text. This is intended exclusively for human readable strings, not for identifiers, measurement values, etc.

urn_samm_io.catenax.fleet.vehicles_2.0.0.description: Vehicle steering position enumeration from NHTSA, see table [vPICList_lite].[dbo].[Steering]
Enumeration of drive type according NHTSA, table [vPICList_lite].[dbo].[DriveType]

equipmentIdentifier.description: The identifier of a specific equipment.

group.description: Bundels all equipment-oriented information into categories like Interior

urn_samm_io.catenax.fleet.vehicles_2.0.0.description: List of equipments installed in the vehicle.

urn_samm_org.eclipse.esmf.samm_character.description: Describes a Property which contains the date and time with an optional timezone.

urn_samm_io.catenax.fleet.vehicles_2.0.0.description: Regular Expression that ensures a three-letter code

plantIdentifier.description: Plant id of the final assembly of the vehicle

plantDescription.description: Long name of the production plant of the vehicle

countryCode.description: Vehicle sold country in ISO 8601 alpha 3

soldDate.description: Sold date of the vehicle = warranty start date for this vehicle

countryCode.description: Vehicle sold country in ISO 8601 alpha 3

countryGroup.description: Region where this car was sold

urn_samm_io.catenax.fleet.vehicles_2.0.0.description: Enumeration from NHTSA vpic database, table [vPICList_lite].[dbo].[FuelType]

engineId.description: OEM-specific identifier/type of the installed engine

engineSeries.description: Engine series as defined by OEM

serialNumber.description: Serial number of the installed engine

size.description: Cubic capacity in a combustion engine  - not available in battery-electric vehicles

power.description: Engine power is the power that an engine can put out

engineProductionDate.description: Date when the engine was produced

installDate.description: Date when the engine was installed

nhtsaFuelType.description: Description of the fuel according US NHTSA

urn_samm_io.catenax.fleet.vehicles_2.0.0.description: A list of all installed engines in the vehicle

urn_samm_io.catenax.shared.uuid_1.0.0_Uu.description: The provided regular expression ensures that the UUID is composed of five groups of characters separated by hyphens, in the form 8-4-4-4-12 for a total of 36 characters (32 hexadecimal characters and 4 hyphens), optionally prefixed by "urn:uuid:" to make it an IRI.

urn_samm_io.catenax.fleet.vehicles_2.0.0.description: Restricts the length of wmiCode to exactly 3 chars
Vehicle data that does not fit into one of the other entities.

anonymizedVin.description: OEM-specific hashed VIN; link to car data over pseydomized/hashed VIN or Catena-X unique digital twin identifier.

vehicleSeries.description: vehicle series, normally one level above model. E.g. vehicle series ="Golf", vehicle model="Golf VIII"

modelIdentifier.description: OEM-specific model identifier or OEM-specific project name.

steeringPos.description: Position of vehicle steering wheel, Left or right.

driveType.description: Drive type of a vehicle according enumeration.

systemPower.description: Complete power of this vehicle in KW.

hybridizationType.description: Degree of hybridization in this vehicle.

softwareCategory.description:
Some OEMs bring in the software as complete package for all systems:
To identify this software: software category and software version is needed.
Software category when this car was built.

softwareVersion.description:
Some OEMs brings in the software as complete package for all systems:
To identify this software: software category and software version is needed.
Software version when this car was built
.

productionPlant.description: This property bundles production-related information coming from the vehicles production plant.

sale.description: This property bundles all sales related information.

engines.description: List of installed engines in the vehicle.

catenaXVehicleId.description: A unique identifier for the vehicle in the Catena-X data space.

wmiCode.description: The world manufacturer index are the first 3 letters of the VIN. IT describes a code for the vehicle manufacturer. Also see the description from NTHSA.

nhtsaWmiName.description: Name of the vehicle manufacturer according NHTSA: use https://vpic.nhtsa.dot.gov/api/vehicles/decodewmi/WVW?format=json - entry to be used is CommonName
